overview:
With a proven track record in developing and scaling organizations, Morgan is responsible for growth, business development and client management as the company continues to expand its considered commerce client base.

Prior to Blueport Commerce, Morgan served as U.S. General Manager and Senior Executive Vice President of Sales and Marketing for Owera, Inc., a software maker for the communications industry with a specialty in Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) router device design.

Prior to Owera, Morgan served as Vice President of Sales and Marketing for Global IP Sound (GIPS). While at GIPS, Morgan executed new business contracts driving the companyâ€™s market cap from $75M to $250M.

Morganâ€™s life before VoIP included the growth and sale of Optical Disc Equipment Group for the Fairchild Corporation, the Boston-based battery development corporation MATSI, Inc. and global luxury goods conglomerate Richemont, owner of such brands as Cartier, IWC, Piaget, Dunhill and Mont Blanc.

Morgan’s interests include cooking, travel, politics and Greyhound welfare and rescue.
